meta.name: description
meta.content: Metronic admin dashboard live demo. Check out all the features of the admin panel. A large number of settings, additional services and widgets.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Metronic, bootstrap, bootstrap 5, Angular 11, VueJs, React, Laravel, admin themes, web design, figma, web development, ree admin themes, bootstrap admin, bootstrap dashboard

body.class: header-fixed header-tablet-and-mobile-fixed toolbar-enabled toolbar-fixed toolbar-tablet-and-mobile-fixed aside-enabled aside-fixed

div.class: btn btn-icon w-auto px-0 btn-active-color-primary aside-toggle

menu menu-lg-rounded menu-column menu-lg-row menu-state-bg menu-title-gray-700 menu-state-title-primary menu-state-icon-primary menu-state-bullet-primary menu-arrow-gray-400 fw-bold my-5 my-lg-0 align-items-stretch
topbar-item cursor-pointer symbol px-3 px-lg-5 me-n3 me-lg-n5 symbol-30px symbol-md-35px
menu menu-sub menu-sub-dropdown menu-column menu-rounded menu-gray-600 menu-state-bg-light-primary fw-bold py-4 fs-6 w-275px
page-title d-flex align-items-center me-3 flex-wrap mb-5 mb-lg-0 lh-1

span.class: btn btn-sm btn-color-muted btn-active btn-active-primary px-4
btn btn-sm btn-color-muted btn-active btn-active-primary px-4

btn btn-sm btn-color-muted btn-active btn-active-primary px-4
btn btn-sm btn-color-muted btn-active btn-active-primary px-4
btn btn-sm btn-color-muted btn-active btn-active-primary px-4

input.placeholder: Scope of Design Output Required from the Temporary Works Engineer:
Attachments / Spec / Existing Designs and Existing Site Conditions (folders to upload)

ul.li: Push Pulls for Precast Walls and Columns
Access Platform for Machines and Temporary Ramps
Protection Shield (steel Shield to Cover Railway While Working with a Crane Above)
Cut and Carve Beam and Slab Support
Preliminary Sketches (prior to full TW design for discussion with site team)
Construction Drawings (with notes on loadings, restrictions, critical components, etc.)
Design Calculations (where needed for submission to client etc.)
Design Check Certificate (were needed for submission to client, etc.)
Construction / Erection Sequence Information (to include in method statement)
Inspection Checklist (for erection, loading, inspection, dismantling, etc.)

div.h2: Attachments / Spec / Existing Designs and Existing Site Conditions (folders to upload)

ul.li: List of attachments/sketches/ Photos / Specifications /Drawings etc.

Reports including Site Investigations- relevant boreholes/ trial pits/ site investigation. Any Existing or proposed services above or below the groundwhere appropriate minimum clearances and protection are required to be maintained.
Preferred/non-preferred methods, systems or types of equipment:
Access limitations or edge protection requirements:
Details of any hazards identified during the risk or hazard assessment that require action by the Temporary Works Designer to eliminate or control all risks or hazard

div.class: container-fluid d-flex flex-column flex-md-row align-items-center justify-content-between
